benchmark_details.name: ToolLens
benchmark_details.overview: ToolLens is a new dataset crafted specifically for multi-tool scenarios, containing queries that require the collaborative use of multiple tools to simulate real-world retrieval conditions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive resource for improving tool retrieval performance in the context of large language models (LLMs).

data.source: Constructed from existing tool data and refined using human verification and GPT-4 generative prompts.
data.annotation: Human verified and generated using GPT-4

methodology.calculation: Performance is calculated using a novel metric COMP@K, which measures the completeness of retrieved tools.
methodology.interpretation: Higher COMP@K values indicate better completeness in the tool retrieval results.
methodology.validation: Extensive experiments including comparisons to established benchmarks and metrics.
